name: The Interference
description:
Made in a week for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2. Theme: REWIND.

***PLANNED UPDATES AFTER GAME JAM ENDS ***

[We're planning on taking all feedback and adding more content to the game, redefining and further polishing the entire sequence where we're not meeting a certain time limit. Stay tuned for the full version!]

====================

The power struggle between mortals has always been a form of entertainment to the gods. How will they interfere with time at their disposal?

This game features a narrative adventure that is enhanced by puzzle and first-person shooter elements. Uncover the mystery and events that point to your questions about your past, present and future.

KeysControlsWASDMovementLMBInteractRReload
Alt+F4Close the game (totally forgot to disable the cursor at the end - Oops!)

If you liked or enjoyed our game, please leave a rating and tell us your feedback!
